Class Config

java.lang.Object
  sudoku.si.Config
Direct Known Subclasses:
NullConfig
public class Config
extends Object

Configures the configurables.

find

public static Config find()
Finds a Config object based on implicit code context. The context is where in the code this method is called, either at the method, the class or the package level.

Returns:
the implicitly named Config object.

getXStream

private static com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getXStream()
Creates and returns an XStream object for converting to and from XML. The aliases become the tag names in the XML document. There CANNOT be a space in a tag name.

write

public void write(OutputStream out)
           throws IOException
Converts a Configuration object to an XML file.

Throws:
IOException

read

public static Config read(InputStream in)
                   throws IOException
Returns a Config object that has been saved to a file connected to an input stream and converts from XML to a Java object.

Throws:
IOException

init

private void init()
Initializes the Config instance. Sets its parent to the Config object loaded from the parent context, if any, otherwise to the NullConfig singleton. Then calls sync().

getParentContext

private String getParentContext()
Gets the parent context for this Config. getParentContext("sudoku.si.Config") returns "sudoku.si" getParentContext("sudoku.si") returns "sudoku" getParentContext("sudoku") returns null
